PackageOracle.name: DA_EQUIP_PROD_INST
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_EQUIP_PROD_INST
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.53.312230000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,equipment_esn_val IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_barcode_val IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_cost_amt IN NUMBER
,equip_prod_inst_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_nickname_val IN VARCHAR2
,equip_prod_inst_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equip_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,equip_sec_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equip_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,equip_sec_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (

,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,equipment_esn_val IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_barcode_val IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_cost_amt IN NUMBER

,equipment_nickname_val IN VARCHAR2
,equip_prod_inst_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER

);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_equip_prod_inst;

body.name: DA_EQUIP_PROD_INST
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_EQUIP_PROD_INST
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.53.324789000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,equipment_esn_val IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_barcode_val IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_cost_amt IN NUMBER
,equip_prod_inst_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_nickname_val IN VARCHAR2
,equip_prod_inst_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equip_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,equip_sec_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_equip_prod_inst.add(fx), parms=' || equipment_product_id || '|' || equipment_esn_val || '|' || equipment_barcode_val || '|' || equipment_cost_amt || '|' || equip_prod_inst_type_cd || '|' || equipment_nickname_val || '|' || equip_prod_inst_status_cd || '|' || billing_station_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || equip_mac_address_id || '|' || equip_sec_mac_address_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_equip_prod_inst a
(
a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.equip_prod_inst_id
,a.equipment_product_id
,a.equipment_esn_val
,a.equipment_barcode_val
,a.equipment_cost_amt
,a.equip_prod_inst_type_cd
,a.equipment_nickname_val
,a.equip_prod_inst_status_cd
,a.billing_station_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.equip_mac_address_id
,a.equip_sec_mac_address_id
)
VALUES
(
'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
,chtr.s_equip_prod_inst_id.NEXTVAL
,add.equipment_product_id
,add.equipment_esn_val
,add.equipment_barcode_val
,add.equipment_cost_amt
,add.equip_prod_inst_type_cd
,add.equipment_nickname_val
,add.equip_prod_inst_status_cd
,add.billing_station_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.equip_mac_address_id
,add.equip_sec_mac_address_id
) RETURNING a.equip_prod_inst_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_equip_prod_inst.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,equipment_esn_val IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_barcode_val IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_cost_amt IN NUMBER
,equip_prod_inst_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_nickname_val IN VARCHAR2
,equip_prod_inst_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equip_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,equip_sec_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_equip_prod_inst.add, parms=' || equipment_product_id || '|' || equipment_esn_val || '|' || equipment_barcode_val || '|' || equipment_cost_amt || '|' || equip_prod_inst_type_cd || '|' || equipment_nickname_val || '|' || equip_prod_inst_status_cd || '|' || billing_station_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || equip_mac_address_id || '|' || equip_sec_mac_address_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_equip_prod_inst a
(
a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.equip_prod_inst_id
,a.equipment_product_id
,a.equipment_esn_val
,a.equipment_barcode_val
,a.equipment_cost_amt
,a.equip_prod_inst_type_cd
,a.equipment_nickname_val
,a.equip_prod_inst_status_cd
,a.billing_station_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.equip_mac_address_id
,a.equip_sec_mac_address_id
)
VALUES
(
'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
,chtr.s_equip_prod_inst_id.NEXTVAL
,add.equipment_product_id
,add.equipment_esn_val
,add.equipment_barcode_val
,add.equipment_cost_amt
,add.equip_prod_inst_type_cd
,add.equipment_nickname_val
,add.equip_prod_inst_status_cd
,add.billing_station_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.equip_mac_address_id
,add.equip_sec_mac_address_id
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_equip_prod_inst.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,equipment_esn_val IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_barcode_val IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_cost_amt IN NUMBER
,equip_prod_inst_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_nickname_val IN VARCHAR2
,equip_prod_inst_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equip_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,equip_sec_mac_address_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_equip_prod_inst.add, parms=' || equip_prod_inst_id || '|' || equipment_product_id || '|' || equipment_esn_val || '|' || equipment_barcode_val || '|' || equipment_cost_amt || '|' || equip_prod_inst_type_cd || '|' || equipment_nickname_val || '|' || equip_prod_inst_status_cd || '|' || billing_station_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || equip_mac_address_id || '|' || equip_sec_mac_address_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_equip_prod_inst a
(
a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.equip_prod_inst_id
,a.equipment_product_id
,a.equipment_esn_val
,a.equipment_barcode_val
,a.equipment_cost_amt
,a.equip_prod_inst_type_cd
,a.equipment_nickname_val
,a.equip_prod_inst_status_cd
,a.billing_station_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.equip_mac_address_id
,a.equip_sec_mac_address_id
)
VALUES
(
'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
,add.equip_prod_inst_id
,add.equipment_product_id
,add.equipment_esn_val
,add.equipment_barcode_val
,add.equipment_cost_amt
,add.equip_prod_inst_type_cd
,add.equipment_nickname_val
,add.equip_prod_inst_status_cd
,add.billing_station_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.equip_mac_address_id
,add.equip_sec_mac_address_id
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_equip_prod_inst.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_equip_prod_inst.del, parms=' || equip_prod_inst_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_equip_prod_inst a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.equip_prod_inst_id = del.equip_prod_inst_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_equip_prod_inst.del');

END del;

END da_equip_prod_inst;
